channel.title: Custom webclient?
channel.description:
Okay guys ive had no luck making my custom webclient ive tried everything and my players are really bugging me about this if anyone could help thatd be really great :)
Edit: Ive posted the error i get below!

item.title: Custom webclient?
item.dc:creator: @cudiii cudiii
item.description:
@cudiii wrote:

Skiire:

You’re running it with a different version of Java than that in which you used to compile the source. The webclient was successful, well, I shouldn’t say that, but that’s not an error that has to do with the actual webclient.

Uhmmmm how do i change that lol (Thank you very much for the help so far)
great another error now

item.title: Custom webclient?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

You’re running it with a different version of Java than that in which you used to compile the source. The webclient was successful, well, I shouldn’t say that, but that’s not an error that has to do with the actual webclient.

Read full topic
